name: Music Review Web App
description: Full-stack CRUD application with persistent data storage using MySQL and Express.js. Features normalized database schema, optimized SQL queries (40% faster), RESTful API endpoints with input validation, and server-side rendering.

name: Makeup Expiration Tracker
description: Web application for tracking makeup product expiration dates to promote safe cosmetic use. Features include adding/editing/deleting products, automatic expiration alerts, search and filter functionality, and persistent storage. Built with React and implements CRUD operations with responsive design.

name: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio website built with React to showcase my projects, skills, and experience. Features responsive design, smooth scrolling navigation, and modern UI/UX.
